content: Oh great, XYZ again. Last time you guys totally messed up my AC repair, and now it’s barely working. Why should I even bother contacting you again?
I'm really sorry to hear about your previous experience. I'd like to help make things right and ensure your AC is taken care of properly this time. Could I please have your name to get started?
Does it even matter? It’s Kelly. You better not mess this up again.
Thank you, Kelly. I understand your frustration, and I’ll do my best to help. Could you please provide the address where you'd like us to look at your AC?
It's 2832 Greenbriar Lane. Don't make me repeat myself.
Thank you for the address, Kelly. I’ll make sure everything is recorded correctly. When would be a convenient time for us to send a technician to check your AC?
Tomorrow afternoon. Hopefully you send someone who actually knows what they're doing.
Thanks for letting me know. I'll check our calendar now for tomorrow afternoon and make sure we send a qualified technician.

We have availability tomorrow afternoon. I will go ahead and book your appointment. Is there anything else you'd like us to know about the AC issue, or any specific concerns from last time that you want addressed?
